item.title: Next-Gen Email Is on The Way
item.description: There are great many messaging apps out there, but email, despite being one of the oldest technologies, remains probably the most important one. Email is the key to our digital identity: various studies show that on average 100 to 150 other accounts are linked to a single email address in the US. The unpleasant truth most people forget is that their email does not belong to them. Your very own name in the Web, along with all the associated data, is controlled and therefore owned by the technology provider.
